Banner.Description: I'm a software engineer with over 2 years of experience, specializing in web application and technological solutions. I pride myself on my ability to translate project requirements into visually appealing and efficient solutions. Currently, I'm employed at INFICARE Pvt Ltd, where I focus on building accessible, remittance solution.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: Hey there, I'm Suman Osti. I hold a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Information System and currently exploring the world of Fullstack Web Development. Throughout my career, I've been involved in various large-scale projects, prioritizing responsive design, performance optimization, and cross-functional collaboration. I love turning a project's 'wish list' into something that not only looks great but also performs well.

On a typical day, you'll find me working on API development and integrations, turning ideas into actual, reliable things, and squashing bugs with our QA team. I'm all about teamwork, taking ownership of what I do, and always looking for ways to help others grow in their roles, too.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
AboutMe.conclude: So that's a bit about me. Can't wait to bring my skills and passion to some more exciting projects!
Experience.Title: Where I've Worked

Experience.Jobs.Title: .Net Developer
Description: Developing as well as integrating APIs, working with various other partners from around the globe for integrating APIs to make global remittance easier and accessible
Revamped admin template and upgrading system to use latest framework and tools.
Migrated the old user interface / UI to an MVC design pattern, utilizing modern technologies with the help of mostly .Net
Optimizing system to make it more effective and efficient.
Increasing efficiency by reducing redundancy as well as decreasing latency in the overall system

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack web Developer
Description: Developing various system that are required by the client from backend to frontend.
Used .Net framework for the backend and using ReactJs for the frontend.
Entity framework ORM was used and we used SqlServer as the database.
Implemented google's material design philosophy and component for the developement of UI.

FeatureProjects.Title: Some Things I've Built
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: E-commerce web app
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: The web application serves as e-commerce platform which enables user to signUp, login. This allows user to browse through the products. Lets them add product to their cart, users can decrease increase or delete product from their cart and they can also pay the amount of their bill from their credit or debit cards. Integration of the stripe paymemnt processor allows for this feature. User can view the status of their product after placing an order.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Guff Gaff - A dating app
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: In guff gaff you can Like a user. This app allows you to upload multiple photos to your profile. It lets you change your profile photo with suitable photo that you like. You can see who ever is online, their profile icon will glow green if they are online. You can chat with other users and it will be visible in real time whether they have read the message you sent or not. You can browse through the photo gallery of the user and see their photos.

OtherProjects.Title: Other Noteworthy Projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Gmoney trans, South korea
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: While I was working at inficare, it also provides outsourcing facilities and I got the chance to work on a global remittance and payment solution platform. Gmoney allows you to do cross border payments, send money anywhere around the globe.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: RemitX
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: This app specializes remittance software solution for institutions around the globe. Feature enrich software that is capable of handling extensive requests and large amount of data. Collectively handles more than aprox. 200,000 transactions per day.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
Testimonial.Title: My clients' impressions of me

Testimonial.Items.Comment: Collaborating with suman has been a game-changer. His coding prowess complements our UI/UX vision flawlessly. Suman not only translates designs into functional code but elevates them with an intuitive touch. Their dedication to refining user interfaces and solving design challenges is commendable. Suman is a reliable partner who consistently delivers results beyond expectations. Their ability to grasp design nuances and implement them with technical finesse makes them an invaluable asset. I appreciate suman for his collaborative spirit, adaptability, and unwavering commitment to enhancing the user experience. Working together has been both enjoyable and productive.
Testimonial.Items.Name: Umang shrestha

Testimonial.Items.Comment: Collaborating with suman has been a transformative experience. As a Team Lead, I appreciate their unwavering dedication, exceptional problem-solving skills, and commitment to excellence. Suman consistently delivers high-quality code, propelling our projects to success. Their ability to adapt to challenges and mentor junior team members showcases true leadership. Suman is not just a valuable asset but a driving force behind our team's achievements. I highly recommend him for his technical prowess, work ethic, and collaborative spirit.
Testimonial.Items.Name: Bhim Mahato

Testimonial.Items.Comment: I want to express my gratitude to Suman. His coding and problem-solving skills have been vital for our projects. Suman meets expectations, delivering top-notch, efficient code that aligns seamlessly with our business goals. His commitment, reliability, and proactive attitude make them an invaluable asset to our development team. I'm glad for our collaboration and the innovative solutions, suman consistently brings to the table. Here's to more success for his future endeavours, all the best!
Testimonial.Items.Name: Zenis Maharjan
